description:
Addictive learning game pits man versus machine. Who's smarter? Search bots find answers. Guess the question. Did the robots show smart clues? Beat the 5 minute timer. 

Game pack provides the following:
- Collection of chapters
- Classic match and slots games
- Innovative Pictionary with a search-bot
- Slow spelling of the answer, letter every 5 seconds
- Image results from Google, Bing, and Yahoo
- Clue with meaning or context
- Cheat sheet with the list of answers/context

This biology collection includes over 1,000 terms; is organized into 14 chapters and hundreds of lessons; and targets high school learning and SAT prep.

It is part of the 4-book series on animals, life sciences, biology SAT prep, and biology advanced placement.

Join the 300,000 plus who have downloaded Keys apps - the #1 education app network on Earth.
